snippet: As the third selection in Ms. Winfrey’s revived book club, she chose a novel by Sue Monk Kidd, which will be published in January.
abstract: Oprah Winfrey selects The Invention of Wings by Sue Monk Kidd as third book in her revived book club.
lead_paragraph: As the third selection in Ms. Winfrey’s revived book club, she chose a novel by Sue Monk Kidd, which will be published in January.

headline.main: Oprah Winfrey Picks ‘Invention of Wings’ for Her Book Club
headline.print_headline: Winfrey Chooses Book By Sue Monk Kidd
